<pre>PROMO SPECIALE ! 10 % à 50 % de remise avec les codes littlesummer, mediumsummer et bigsummer pour 1, 3, 6, ou 12 mois et + !</pre>

https://www.firstheberg.com/serveur-dedie

http://s.lowendshare.com/5/1402371345.228.2014-06-10T033521Z-fh.png

Go get it :D

Now, some more info about Firstheberg, their Pros:

1) 4GB of RAM and a choice of 2x500GB RAID or SSD on the cheapest Atom (which was already a nice deal even at 13 EUR)  
2) they are not OVH  
3) and not online.net  

and Cons:

1) ...they are still from FR  
2) network is not very impressive: only 10 Mbit comes guaranteed with the Atom, also they are located in some far-away village (affecting pings and routing) and have mostly one upstream, Cogent http://bgp.he.net/AS197922  
3) IPv6 support is still not implemented, I think they promised "next week" to me about 1.5 years ago  
4) does not look like they have implemented the automatic VAT deduction in their panel, so likely they still do it manually, and not by deducting VAT, but by extending the paid term for customers who should be VAT-exempt (have to ask for this via ticket every time)  

Not clear whether this promo is recurring or not.

See the earlier LET thread for more reviews: http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/13052/another-french-budget-dedi-provider-firstheberg/p1
